## Set Up

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(DataComputing)
library(rvest)
library(lubridate)
library(tidyr)
```


```{r}
page <-  "https://data.cityofnewyork.us/Public-Safety/Fire-Incident-Dispatch-Data/8m42-w767/data"

xpath <- '//*[@id="renderTypeContainer"]/div[4]/div[2]/div/div[4]/div[1]/table'


table_list <- 
  page %>%
  read_html() %>%
  html_nodes(xpath= xpath) %>%
  html_table(fill = TRUE)

FireIncidents <- table_list[[1]]
```
